description: Zampano is a military operative under the command of http://anidb.net/ch14594 [Solf J. Kimblee]. He was used as a test subject in military experiments and is now a human chimera capable of transforming into a strange, pig-like beast. Zampano is partnered with http://anidb.net/ch16467 [Jerso].
name: Zampano
